title: 为什么小黑能瞬移
author: junge_流氓君
txt_content: 小黑这么高，不怕瞬移卡到或撞到墙么

replies.author: 梦幻之城
replies.txt_content: 因为小黑有末影珍珠

replies.author: 莫良3
replies.txt_content: 小黑开挂了呗

replies.author: 侑阳
replies.txt_content: 因为这是末影之力什么鬼233

replies.author: zz20408
replies.txt_content: 因为他是enderman
他会计算好的不用你操心

replies.author: 浅诺
replies.txt_content: 因为他是小黑啊~

replies.author: zz20408
replies.txt_content: 游戏设定，增加神秘感

replies.author: 古往今
replies.txt_content: 猜猜看为什么末影珍珠能瞬移

replies.author: 境界の彼方
replies.txt_content: 因为他是末影龙的小弟

replies.txt_content:

各种闪进水

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 他又不是没少卡过墙。。

replies.author: Bolly
replies.txt_content: 为什么你能水贴

因为是以slenderman作为原型创作的，slenderman能瞬移
故小黑能瞬移~

replies.author: ookone
replies.txt_content: 貌似 2格厚度的墙小黑 移动不过去的。。。。
